thread.title: Ajay Devgn: Hollywood has started recognising Indian films, talent
thread.title_full: Ajay Devgn: Hollywood has started recognising Indian films, talent - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Ajay Devgn: Hollywood has started recognising Indian films, talent
text:
Actor-filmmaker Ajay Devgn feels that the gap between Indian cinema and Hollywood is bridging gradually as people in the West have started showing interest in Indian talent and films.*Ajay Devgn*
Asked whether in the coming years, India can produce more of actors who can play lead roles in Hollywood films, Ajay said at the CII ... Â»
